title: Miss Fortunes Splash is the most embarrassing one in the game
body:
Like, I'm not a feminist or anything and I think Riot does a good job portraying woman to look attractive without obscenely sexualising them. But this splash says one thing: Hey look, boobs.

http://na.leagueoflegends.com/sites/default/files/styles/wide_medium/public/upload/mf-splash-banner.jpg?itok=huOFCO40

If this is supposed to look like a bounty hunter it fails completely.  Captain Miss Fortune should be the classic splash because not only does it simply outclass the original, it Portrays the champion accurately for who she actually is. Even the Bilgewater event didn't touch classic MF because it simply doesn't fit.

http://i.ytimg.com/vi/uJ70UUcvxCo/hqdefault.jpg

This looks like a bounty hunter. This looks like a character that could be taken seriously. Some one that can manipulate men with charm or blow their head off.

replies.body: As an MF main this thread gets Downvote of shame

tbh if you are attached to that splash then all power to you, but it's bad by any measure and objectifies women in a needless way. She could be portrayed as sexy pirate hunter without appearing as just a pornstar. 

But then again it's a video game forum.

Shut up.

Her classic splash art is iconic and you will deal with it if you don't like it. Your opinion does not matter. {{champion:21}}

If you want to talk about the value of an opinion, yours is completely worthless since you didn't contribute anything even slightly intelligent.

You want to try again? I'll give you another chance.
yours is already less then most cause you're OCE, so go back there and leave us.
NA comeback

It's not like a lot of the other champs are out of trashy-halloween costume territory.
{{champion:28}} {{champion:9}} {{champion:44}}
Her identity is intentionally "sexy pirate bounty hunter".
All I get from the splash is "sexy pirate". That doesn't look like a bounty hunter, more like a trashy halloween costume.

Yeah, it looks completely exaggerated, to the point where it looks like a cartoon or a caricature or something.


http://ddragon.leagueoflegends.com/cdn/img/champion/splash/Garen_0.jpg

Sex object, sex objectification, problematic, sex objectification, patriarchy problematic, triggered.
The classic splash art also has a case of broken spine syndrome. A good amount of the female champs have broken spine syndrome.

Her breasts are kind of the centerpiece of both pictures... Just sayin

Don't kid yourself here.

My point wasn't that Captain Miss fortune isn't sexualized at all because that is part of the character. My point is with the classic, that is all it is. The art looks more like a pornstar than anything else. 

And if you think there is no difference between both art I don't know what to tell you.

The thing is:
Miss fortune is a character who is almost permanently flirting,with those around her.

As we've seen in the bilgewater event,she acts like this on the outside,the captain miss fortune splash more or less depicts how she really is on the inside.

As far as i know yes, she is that flirty in the outside.
Capitain miss fortune depicts her more like she is when she does not need to flirt anymore.

But i agree that the spine breaker doe snot make much sense :P
MF is a champion that isn't afraid to use sex as a weapon. She will gladly manipulate you to get what she wants.

Oh no, Fiora's new splash is much worse.

Still don't care for the balloon breasts that are in MF's current base splash and never will.  Dare not ask for a new one... as she will end up with something like the new Fiora splash and it will look down right hideous.
